body_html:
@gragundier if TF Lite related stuff compiled with optimization flags is what you need, I think something like

bazel build --config opt \
--local_resources 1024.0,0.5,0.5 \
--copt=-mfpu=neon-vfpv4 \
--copt=-ftree-vectorize \
--copt=-funsafe-math-optimizations \
--copt=-ftree-loop-vectorize \
--copt=-fomit-frame-pointer \
--copt=-DRASPBERRY_PI \
--host_copt=-DRASPBERRY_PI \
//tensorflow/contrib/lite/tools/benchmark:benchmark_model

on your Pi devices works. Building the whole TensorFlow pip package natively on Pi devices is painful. But building only TF Lite related code should be fine.

body:
@gragundier if TF Lite related stuff compiled with optimization flags is what you need, I think something like
```
bazel build --config opt \
--local_resources 1024.0,0.5,0.5 \
--copt=-mfpu=neon-vfpv4 \
--copt=-ftree-vectorize \
--copt=-funsafe-math-optimizations \
--copt=-ftree-loop-vectorize \
--copt=-fomit-frame-pointer \
--copt=-DRASPBERRY_PI \
--host_copt=-DRASPBERRY_PI \
//tensorflow/contrib/lite/tools/benchmark:benchmark_model
```
on your Pi devices works. Building the whole TensorFlow pip package natively on Pi devices is painful. But building only TF Lite related code should be fine.
